bug.author: CarloLucibello
bug.description:
on julia 0.6 when taking powers of recorded Float32 array the result is a Float64 array julia> a=Rec(rand(Float32,3)) S[3]113R
julia> AutoGrad.unbox(a) 3-element Array{Float32,1}: 0.988303 0.40873 0.371695
julia> AutoGrad.unbox(a.^2) 3-element Array{Float64,1}: 0.976743 0.16706 0.138157
